708281f-a.text:
West side of fourth Avenue north from 31st Street.
1908.
Brown Brothers, Photographers.

708282f-a.text: 4th Avenue, 31st Street, to 32nd Street (Before Reconstruction) March 21, 1920

708290f-a.text:
477 to 461 Fourth Avenue, east side, south from East 32nd to 31st Street's, showing a row of buildings standing on what was originally the center of an old Sun Fish Pond.  Occupying the stores at No. 473-71 is the Rhinelander Real Estate Company.  To the right is a 12-story office building (No. 461) at the N.E. corner of East 31st Street.

June 1938.
George D. Chinn

711997f-a.text:
113-115 East 31st Street, north side, between Fourth and Lexington Avenues.

June 23, 1932.

P.L. Sperr

A modern 5 story apt. is to be erected - we/No's. 113 + 113 1/2 2/25/1940

711998f-a.text:
113-113 1/2 East 31st Street, north side, between Fourth and Lexington Avenues.

June 20, 1932

P.L. Sperr.

722019f-a.text:
(1) Park Ave, west side, north from but not including 31st, to, but not including 33rd Streets. The view shows the Park Ave Hotel which was opened as the Women's Hotel, a semi-charitable institution in 1878 by A. T. Stewart. North of same is seen the Vanderbilt Hotel. December 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster, Collection.
(2) The same, another view. December 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster, Collection,
